title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Cards
subtitle: All the Yu-Gi-Oh! cards available at https://ygoprodeck.com/
description:
All the cards from your popular trading card game Yu-Gi-Oh.

Information downloaded from https://ygoprodeck.com/ via its API.

The literal and graphical information presented on this dataset Yu-Gi-Oh!, including card images, the attribute, level/rank and type symbols, and card text, is copyright of 4K Media Inc, a subsidiary of Konami Digital Entertainment, Inc.

resources.description: The main file of this dataset, it contains all the information related to the cards

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID or Passocde of the card.

fields.name: type
fields.title: The type of card you are viewing (Normal Monster, Effect Monster, Synchro Monster, Spell Card, Trap Card, etc).

fields.name: atk
fields.title: The ATK value of the card.

fields.name: def
fields.title: The DEF value of the card.

fields.name: race
fields.title: The card race which is officially called type (Spellcaster, Warrior, Insect, etc).

fields.name: archetype
fields.title: The Archetype that the card belongs to.

fields.name: linkval
fields.title: The Link Value of the card if it's of type "Link Monster".

fields.name: linkmarkers
fields.title: The Link Markers of the card if it's of type "Link Monster". This information is stored as an array.

fields.name: image_url_small
fields.title: The main artwork image in a smaller version.

fields.name: ban_tcg
fields.title: The status of the card on the TCG Ban List.

fields.name: ban_ocg
fields.title: The status of the card on the OCG Ban List.

fields.name: ban_goat
fields.title: The status of the card on the GOAT Format Ban List.
